message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a unique opportunity to own something truly special. I'm willing to start with a price of $9200. Is this something you'd be interested in?
Thank you for offering me the product. I appreciate the uniqueness of the item. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $8500.

I appreciate your counteroffer, Bob! However, I'm not quite ready to meet you at $8500 just yet. I'm willing to come down to $9000. This is a fair price considering the product's value to you, and I think it's a great opportunity for both of us to come to a mutually beneficial agreement.
I understand your position, Alice. I am willing to increase my offer to $8700. I hope this brings us closer to reaching an agreement.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Bob! However, I'm still not convinced that $8700 is a fair price for this exceptional product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I'll offer it to you for $9500. This is a compromise that I think is reasonable, considering the value you've placed on the product.
I respect your position, Alice. I am willing to offer $9000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob! However, I'm still not ready to sell at $9000. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I'll offer it to you for $9500 is still too high for me, so I will offer it to you for $9200. This is my final compromise, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
